projects.title: Customer Dashboard for Plastic Production Cycle
projects.description: A platform to monitor plastic production cycles across manufacturers, ensuring compliance with recycling mandates.

projects.title: AI-Powered Parent Advisor
projects.description: An AI-based mobile advisor for affordable childcare support, utilizing LLM models and AWS infrastructure.

projects.title: Custom Shopify Storefront
projects.description: A custom Shopify Storefront developed using Remix.js and Shopify APIs.

projects.title: Microsoft Teams Extension
projects.description: A full-stack app integrated into Microsoft Teams for global user expansion.

projects.title: Time Management Tool
projects.description: A web tool for tracking and managing time, featuring a serverless architecture.

projects.title: AI Music Classifier
projects.description: Developed ML prototypes for classifying music eras using audio data and spectrogram analysis.

projects.title: AI Screening Tool for Legal Documents
projects.description: Built an AI tool to screen and extract data from legal documents, optimizing operational costs.

projects.title: AI Workflow Designer
projects.description: A visual workflow builder with chainable AI nodes, live co-editing, and multi-tab functionality. Supports multiple AI agents and provides configurable input/output for seamless automation.
